data.actual_result: The sentence breaks up and you are prompted to enter something to search in.
data.expected_result: You should be able to go in with typing without the word breaking up.
data.short_description: Search function gets confused when typing one of the "Extra Functions like "in:""
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the search field - type something like "in the bin:" and when you press : the word breaks and it things you're trying to search something "in"
